attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Force of personality, leadership ability, and social influence

attributes.name: Resolve
attributes.description: Mental fortitude, willpower, and resistance to psychological effects

attributes.name: Intellect
attributes.description: Reasoning ability, memory, and analytical thinking

attributes.name: Might
attributes.description: Physical strength, endurance, and bodily power

attributes.name: Awareness
attributes.description: Sensory perception, intuition, and environmental awareness

attributes.name: Coordination
